text: == UB40 version == "Please Don't Make Me Cry" is a 1970 song by reggae singer Winston Groovy and its best known version is the 1983 single by UB40. It was taken from their fifth studio album Labour of Love and is the following up the their hit single Red Red Wine. It went to number 10 in the United Kingdom, number 41 in New Zealand, number 4 in the Netherlands and number 11 in Belgium. == References == Category:1970 songs Category:Reggae songs Category:UB40 songs
title: Please Don't Make Me Cry
